name: The Forgotten Village
description:
Shipwrecked and alone, you wash up in an empty village, abandoned after its inhabitants lost their memories. At the behest of the totem god, you set out into the wilderness to find the villagers and bring them back home.

Short 2D platformer made using Corgi Engine and Dialogue System. Art, design and story by me. Music by Fabiano Caputo. Other audio by various people from Freesound.
